title: How to write a sales letter - Quora

response.answer_text: Firstly you should write a text and imagine like you are a customer. You have to introduce information that will be attractive for your potential audience. Also you should remember about a structure of the letter. The structure is standard. It includes an introduction, a body and a conclusion. Don’t forget about it! Try to make it easy to read. Use conversation style which is more comfortable for reading by customers. You should use short clear sentences and compose the text in short paragraphs. Edit and re-edit your text. Be sure that there isn’t any mistake and the grammar, punctuation are fine.Don’t forget about headlines to capture attention of customers and get readers interested. The most important issue is to make your readers want your product or service. Then try to ask your customer to take an action. If you need a good sales letter and you can’t do it by your own you should use letter writing services.
